name: top_artists
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_charts_rankings.
Tool description: Billboard chart rankings API: Hot 100 Charts,  Year-End Charts, Hot 100 Songs,  Billboard 200 Albums,  Billboard Global 200, Top Artists.
API description: Fetch the YEAR-END Top Artists chart information from the Billboard API for a specified year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the Top Artists chart information in YYYY format. Defaults to '2022'.
